title: How to Make Sarang Semut Cake

steps.headline: Prepare all of the ingredients and the materials that will be used.
Melt the sugar until it turns brown.
steps.description: Pour the water while stirring the sugar, to dissolve the sugar and form the caramel solution.

steps.headline: Stir the caramel liquid with the electric mixer.
steps.description: Add the eggs one by one. Stir well.

steps.headline: Pour the full cream, margarine, and baking soda into the caramel mixture.
Pour the flour into the batter.
steps.description: Mix, then let the batter stand for 15 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour the batter into a baking pan to which you have greased with a little butter or margarine.
steps.description: Steam for 30 minutes over a low heat until cooked.

steps.headline: Once cooked remove from steamer and let cool.
steps.description: Cut the cake to taste and serve it.

text: Prepare all of the ingredients and the materials that will be used.  Melt the sugar until it turns brown. Pour the water while stirring the sugar, to dissolve the sugar and form the caramel solution. Stir the caramel liquid with the electric mixer. Add the eggs one by one. Stir well. Pour the full cream, margarine, and baking soda into the caramel mixture. Mix well to combine thoroughly. Pour the flour into the batter. Mix, then let the batter stand for 15 minutes. Pour the batter into a baking pan to which you have greased with a little butter or margarine. Steam for 30 minutes over a low heat until cooked. Once cooked remove from steamer and let cool. Cut the cake to taste and serve it.
